name: Monout
description:
Blurb
Feeling irritable, annoyed, or flat out angry? Well, time to “break out” of that shell by breaking a bunch of stupid blocks that are standing in your way! Take control of one of 3 paddles to use your block busting ball to bust some blocks!
Inspired by BreakOut on the Atari 2600.

Controls
Keyboard
Space bar - Start game, shoot ball.
Arrows - Move the paddle.
Enter - Pause.
Mouse
Space bar - Start game, shoot ball.
Mouse - Move the paddle.
Enter - Pause.

Credits
Game, Sound Effects - helewrer3.itch.io
Screens - sontomnetwork.itch.io.

Bugs
None so far, please tell if you find one
